data.title: Alzheimer’s toll is making Prunella Scales ‘disappear’

data.text:
Timothy West has spoken of his sadness and frustration over the “gradual disappearance” of his wife, Prunella Scales, who has dementia.

The actor said that the couple, who have been married for 53 years, managed to enjoy life from day to day, but that he desperately missed the conversations they used to have, as her memory faded.

“Well, the sad thing is that you just watch the gradual disappearance of the person that you knew and loved and were very close to,” he said. “There’s a lot of her left, and we still enjoy life and there are a lot of things that Pru is able to enjoy and we’re able to do ­together,” he told ITV’s Piers Morgan’s Life Stories.
